Package co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

For constructing workflows.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Workflow
    Configures the Workflow by returning a WorkflowSpecification.
    WorkflowAction
    Represents an action that can be executed in a Workflow.
    WorkflowActionSpecification
    Specification for a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowActionSpecification.SpecificationCreator
    Builder interface for the last stage of building a WorkflowActionSpecification.
    WorkflowCompletion
    The WorkflowCompletion interface provides onSuccess() and onFailure() methods.
    WorkflowContext
    Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.
    WorkflowSpecification
    Specification for a Workflow -- an instance of this class is created by the WorkflowSpecification.Builder class.
    WorkflowSpecification.FirstAction<T>
    Builder for adding the first action to the workflow.
    WorkflowSpecification.MoreAction<T>
    Builder for adding more actions to the workflow.
    WorkflowSpecification.ScheduleSetter<T>
    Builder for setting up the schedule of the workflow.
    WorkflowSpecification.SpecificationCreator
    Builder interface for the last stage of building the WorkflowSpecification.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractWorkflowAction  
    WorkflowActionSpecification.Builder
    Builder class for building the WorkflowActionSpecification.
    WorkflowSpecification.Builder
    Builder class for constructing the WorkflowSpecification.

Package co.cask.cdap.api.workflow Description

For constructing workflows.
